messages.content: The Conservatives have learnt nothing from those mistakes: they want to follow exactly the same path again.

messages.title: Your choice.
messages.content: A choice between Labour and the Conservatives.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour's approach has been vastly different - look at the difference in our investment and services.
In Wandsworth, 12,000 - 65% - fewer people are unemployed today than during the last Tory recession. That's 12,000 more people in work thanks to Labour action to protect jobs.

A vote for me will help protect frontline public services, keep investment in SureStart and local schools that has doubled GCSE passes, keep local police numbers high and crime low, and secure the recovery.

mentions.tacticalSituation: In Putney just 1,700 votes separate the Conservatives and me. The Lib Dems cannot win here. A Liberal Democrat vote will guarantee waking up the day after the election to a slash and burn Tory government. If you're considering the Lib Dems please weigh up whether it matters more to let the Tory win again by backing a party that can't win - or instead to make your vote count by voting for me.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet emphasizes the marginal nature of the Putney constituency and the potential impact of strategic voting.
